name: EAC Plugin Local
description: The EAC Plugin enable your browser to support the technology Email Active Content developped by AppInMail in various WebMail client.
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; img-src 'self' https://*.googleusercontent.com/; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; connect-src 'self' https://*.google.com https://*.googleapis.com; script-src 'self' https://apis.google.com; frame-src https://accounts.google.com https://*.googleapis.com
